pr_title: Add metricsMaster.getMetrics() and fix fsadmin report metrics

timeline.message: Add metricsMaster.getMetrics() and fix fsadmin report metrics

timeline.author: calvinjia

timeline.bodyText: There is no easy way to iterate over these? Could we just output the values in the map, that would also avoid the need to expose getMasterMetricName?
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText: Previously we want fsadmin report metrics similar to the master web ui metrics page, that's why we add those complicate logic to add nick name to those metrics. I agreed that we can modify to directly output contents in the map and maybe sort the metrics according to prefix (master/cluster/worker)
replies.author: LuQQiu

timeline.message: Modify fsadmin report metrics to show all metrics

timeline.bodyText: is the cast here correct? Or should we make numFiles + 1 a double (applies to all cases in tests)
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText: The reason that I make double -> long is that assertEquals(double,double) is deprecated and may have some problems in double comparison.
replies.author: LuQQiu

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to use tabs or something for pretty alignment?
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText: We have no categories in the new way of printing all the metrics. Previously indent is used for separating category name and its values. So I remove the indent.
replies.author: LuQQiu
